results.title: Chorus and principals on stage please
results.brief_description: A co-production by Film Australia and the Australian Opera, this film of compelling interest to opera-lovers features throughout Australian stars Joan Sutherland and Richard Bonynge. We are taken behind the Sydney Opera House curtain to explore many of the preparations required to stage such an opera as “Lakma”. With shooting undertaken in Sydney and New York the film leaves a lively impression of the problems of running an opera

results.title: Ask an Australian about her household [Italian version]
results.creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
results.brief_description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Italian.

results.title: Australia : the Land of my dreams = Kraj moich marzen
results.creator_credit: Mariola Gorna and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Born in Poland, Mariola chose to come to Australia. After a long wait in Greece, she was finally granted the right to immigrate to Australia. She tells of the second family she found at Brintons carpet factory and how they were there for her during some of her most difficult times.
results.title_for_label: Australia : the Land of my dreams = Kraj moich marzen
results.description: Born in Poland, Mariola chose to come to Australia. After a long wait in Greece, she was finally granted the right to immigrate to Australia. She tells of the second family she found at Brintons carpet factory and how they were there for her during some of her most difficult times.

results.title: Les Yeux Fermes = the Eyes Closed
results.brief_description:
Ivan returns from touring with a theatre company. During the tour one of Ivan’s friend died. Back in Paris, Ivan experiences vision toubles and buys a pair of black glasses. From then on, he starts pretending to be a blind man. His girlfriend Xenie witnesses helplessly the slow march towards madness of a ‘blind’ man whose only markers are noises and memories..

Credits: Director, Joel Santoni ; writer, Jeanne Bronner, Joel Santoni, Claude Breuer ; photography, Pierre-William Glenn ; music, Terry Riley.
Cast: Gerard Desarthe, Lorraine Rainer, Jean Carmet, Marcel Dalio, Lucien Raimbourg.

Please note this film contains mature themes, violence and nudity.
